metadata.title: USN-5591-1 -- Linux kernel vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that the virtual terminal driver in the Linux kernel did not properly handle VGA console font changes, leading to an out-of-bounds write. A local attacker could use this to cause a denial of service (system crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5591-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  linux-image-4.15.0-1135-gcp - 4.15.0-1135.151~16.04.2 linux-buildinfo-4.15.0-1135-gcp - 4.15.0-1135.151~16.04.2 linux-gcp-tools-4.15.0-1135 -
